message: I have a great opportunity for you to buy a high-quality product that I'm sure you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do $160, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?
I'm starting to think you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $140, but that's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
I understand that's your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and my original offer of $120. Can you do $130?
I'm not going to go any lower than $138. That's the best I can do, and I think you're getting a great deal. Take it or leave it.
